I'm a Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) candidate at UC San Diego – Rady School of Management, expected to graduate in December 2025. I am passionate about leveraging data and analytics to drive actionable business insights.

With a background in Fashion Marketing and experience in statistical analysis, visualization, and machine learning, I aim to bring creative problem-solving and data-driven strategies to organizations across industries.
